entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to periods of rain or snow before morning. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
